metadata.title: CVE-2021-47463 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mm/secretmem: fix NULL page->mapping dereference in page_is_secretmem()Check for a NULL page->mapping before dereferencing the mapping inpage_is_secretmem(), as the page's mapping can be nullified while gup() isrunning, e.g. by reclaim or truncation. BUG: kernel NULL pointerdereference, address: 0000000000000068 #PF: supervisor read access inkernel mode #PF: error_code(0x0000) - not-present page PGD 0 P4D 0 Oops:0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP NOPTI CPU: 6 PID: 4173897 Comm: CPU 3/KVM Tainted: GW RIP: 0010:internal_get_user_pages_fast+0x621/0x9d0 Code: <48> 81 7a 68 8008 04 bc 0f 85 21 ff ff 8 89 c7 be RSP: 0018:ffffaa90087679b0 EFLAGS:00010046 RAX: ffffe3f37905b900 RBX: 00007f2dd561e000 RCX: ffffe3f37905b934RDX: 0000000000000000 RSI: 0000000000000000 RDI: ffffe3f37905b900 ... CR2:0000000000000068 CR3: 00000004c5898003 CR4: 00000000001726e0 Call Trace:get_user_pages_fast_only+0x13/0x20 hva_to_pfn+0xa9/0x3e0try_async_pf+0xa1/0x270 direct_page_fault+0x113/0xad0kvm_mmu_page_fault+0x69/0x680 vmx_handle_exit+0xe1/0x5d0kvm_arch_vcpu_ioctl_run+0xd81/0x1c70 kvm_vcpu_ioctl+0x267/0x670__x64_sys_ioctl+0x83/0xa0 do_syscall_64+0x56/0x80entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47463` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1002.2').
linux-azure package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
